action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: This is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word to gather initial feedback.
guess: apple

attempts = 1
target_word = right
guess = apple
guess_feedback = a<red> p<red> p<red> l<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: a<red> p<red> p<red> l<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: All letters in "apple" are incorrect, so I will try a completely different set of letters, avoiding a, p, l, and e.
guess: brick

attempts = 2
target_word = right
guess = brick
guess_feedback = b<red> r<yellow> i<yellow> c<red> k<red>

guess_feedback: b<red> r<yellow> i<yellow> c<red> k<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters r and i are correct but misplaced. I will use r and i in different positions while avoiding b, c, and k.
guess: irate

attempts = 3
target_word = right
guess = irate
guess_feedback = i<yellow> r<yellow> a<red> t<yellow> e<red>

guess_feedback: i<yellow> r<yellow> a<red> t<yellow> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters r and t are correct but misplaced, and i is also correct but misplaced. I will rearrange these letters and avoid a and e.
guess: trial

attempts = 4
target_word = right
guess = trial
guess_feedback = t<yellow> r<yellow> i<yellow> a<red> l<red>

guess_feedback: t<yellow> r<yellow> i<yellow> a<red> l<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters t, r, and i are correct but misplaced. I will rearrange them again, avoiding a and l, and introducing a new letter.
guess: ritzy

attempts = 5
target_word = right
guess = ritzy
guess_feedback = r<green> i<green> t<yellow> z<red> y<red>

guess_feedback: r<green> i<green> t<yellow> z<red> y<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters r and i are in the correct positions, and t is correct but misplaced. I will keep r and i in their positions, move t, and avoid z and y.
guess: trims

attempts = 6
target_word = right
guess = trims
guess_feedback = t<yellow> r<yellow> i<yellow> m<red> s<red>

guess_explanation: This is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word to gather initial feedback.
All letters in "apple" are incorrect, so I will try a completely different set of letters, avoiding a, p, l, and e.
The letters r and i are correct but misplaced. I will use r and i in different positions while avoiding b, c, and k.
The letters r and t are correct but misplaced, and i is also correct but misplaced. I will rearrange these letters and avoid a and e.
The letters t, r, and i are correct but misplaced. I will rearrange them again, avoiding a and l, and introducing a new letter.
The letters r and i are in the correct positions, and t is correct but misplaced. I will keep r and i in their positions, move t, and avoid z and y.
